member.name: P:GrblPanel.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:GrblPanel.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:GrblPanel.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppEntryAssembly
member.summary: Returns the entry assembly for the current application domain
member.remarks: This is usually read-only, but in some weird cases (Smart Client apps) you won't have an entry assembly, so you may want to set this manually.

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppTitle
member.summary: single line of text to show in the application title section of the about box dialog

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppDescription
member.summary: single line of text to show in the description section of the about box dialog

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppVersion
member.summary: single line of text to show in the version section of the about dialog

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppCopyright
member.summary: single line of text to show in the copyright section of the about dialog
member.remarks: defaults to "Copyright © %year%, %company%" %company% = Assembly: AssemblyCompany %year% = current 4-digit year

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppImage
member.summary: intended for the default 32x32 application icon to appear in the upper left of the about dialog
member.remarks: if you open this form using .ShowDialog(Owner), the icon can be derived from the owning form

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppMoreInfo
member.summary: multiple lines of miscellaneous text to show in rich text box
member.remarks: defaults to "%product% is %copyright%, %trademark%" %product% = Assembly: AssemblyProduct %copyright% = Assembly: AssemblyCopyright %trademark% = Assembly: AssemblyTrademark

member.name: P:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AppDetailsButton
member.summary: determines if the "Details" (advanced assembly details) button is shown

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AboutBox_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: things to do when form is loaded

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AboutBox_Paint(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: things to do when form is FIRST painted

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AssemblyLastWriteTime(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: exception-safe retrieval of LastWriteTime for this assembly.
member.returns: File.GetLastWriteTime, or DateTime.MaxValue if exception was encountered.

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AssemblyBuildDate(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns DateTime this Assembly was last built. Will attempt to calculate from build number, if possible. If not, the actual LastWriteTime on the assembly file will be returned.
member.param: Assembly to get build date for
Don't attempt to use the build number to calculate the date
member.returns: DateTime this assembly was last built

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.AssemblyAttribs(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: returns string name / string value pair of all attribs for specified assembly
member.remarks:
note that Assembly* values are pulled from AssemblyInfo file in project folder
Trademark = AssemblyTrademark string Debuggable = True GUID = 7FDF68D5-8C6F-44C9-B391-117B5AFB5467 CLSCompliant = True Product = AssemblyProduct string Copyright = AssemblyCopyright string Company = AssemblyCompany string Description = AssemblyDescription string Title = AssemblyTitle string

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.RegistryHklmValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: reads an HKLM Windows Registry key value

member.name: M:GrblPanel.AboutBox.ShowSysInfo
member.summary: launch the MSInfo "system information" application (works on XP, 2003, and Vista)

member.summary: populate a listview with the specified key and value strings
